articles.title: Europa's Interior May Be Hot Enough to Fuel Seafloor Volcanoes - NASA
articles.description: Jupiter’s moon Europa has an icy crust covering a vast, global ocean. The rocky layer underneath may be hot enough to melt, leading to undersea volcanoes.
